text:
The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 89.89 feet on Sunday against its full level of 120 feet.

The storage level of the dam was 52.525 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 436 cusecs. About 12,000 cusecs of water is discharged from the dam for Samba cultivation in the Cauvery delta region. Another 600 cusecs is let out for irrigation activities under the dam’s East-West canal system in Salem, Namakkal and Erode districts, the PWD sources said.
title: Mettur Dam level
